name: Sooryen Technologies an indecomm company
description:
• Achieved improved page speed of websites using various page optimization techniques.
  • Implementing A/B test using Google Optimize.
  • Designed and developed WYSIWYG editor functionality using JavaScript, php and tritium.
  • Implemented campaign marketing functionality using AppBoy and JavaScript.
  • Improved conversion rate by implementing various page performance methods on websites.
  • Maintaining and debugging client website using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and tritium.
  • Building GA dashboard using Google Analytics API and React framework.

name: Home of Champions
description:

  • Developed, optimized, expanded functionality using plugins and hosted the website using Bluehost service.
  • Improved performance and User Interface (UI) by analyzing client requirements.
  • Implemented payment gateway using PayPal service in WordPress.

name: Archer Solutions
description:
• Developed Location Positioning device using Android, Arduino, GPS, WAMP and Apache Tomcat.
  • Implemented spiral technique of Software Development Life Cycle.
  • Implemented ZigBee protocol to create Ad-Hoc network.
  • Developed Android application to fetch the location of Life Band device.
  • Composed documentation and professional presentation for given project.

name: Indus University
description:
